taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Brassicaceae;tribe Camelineae;genus Arabidopsis;species arenosa;subspecies arenosa;

bio:treatment.discussion: This is the first record of subsp. arenosa from North America. It is based on M. P. Porsild s.n. (MO) collected from western Greenland, 28 July 1935. It is not known if the occurrence in Greenland represents an introduction or the westernmost extent of its native range.
